sqlList.sql: select t.contact_tel AS USERID,t.fog_order_num AS ORDERNO,t.create_time AS CREATETIME,t.hotel_name AS HOTELNM,t.guest_names AS USERNM from t_lm_order t where t.fog_resvtype <> 'c' AND t.book_status_other <> '3' AND (:STARTDTIME IS NULL OR (t.create_time >= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND (:ENDDTIME IS NULL OR (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') >= t.create_time))
